responsibilities: Executed multi-channel social media campaigns, resulting in a 20% increase in follower engagement across primary platforms.
Managed the editorial calendar for the corporate blog, coordinating with freelance writers to ensure timely delivery of SEO-optimized content.
Tracked and reported on KPIs for monthly email marketing efforts, providing actionable insights for A/B testing subject lines.
Assisted the lead strategist in performing competitive market analysis and keyword research for client accounts.
Collaborated with the design team to produce visual assets for promotional materials and digital advertisements.
Supported on-site event logistics for local brand activations, ensuring all collateral and signage were correctly placed.
